docker pull stratisplatform/stratisfullnode:Stratis.CirrusMinerD-1.1.0.0-ext


docker run -p 38223:38223 stratisplatform/stratisfullnode:Stratis.CirrusMinerD-1.1.0.0-ext

git clone https://github.com/stratisproject/Stratis.SmartContracts.Tools.Sct


cd Stratis.SmartContracts.Tools.Sct

dotnet build

dotnet run validate ../../StratisHelloWorld/HelloWorld.cs -sb


curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/list-wallets' \
  -H 'accept: */*' | jq '.'


curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/accounts?WalletName=cirrusdev' \
  -H 'accept: */*' | jq '.'

curl -X GET "http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/addresses?WalletName=cirrusdev&AccountName=account%200" -H "accept: application/json" | jq '.'

curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/addresses?WalletName=cirrusdev&AccountName=account%200&Segwit=true' \
  -H 'accept: */*' | jq '.' 


curl -X POST "http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContractWallet/create" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" -d "{ \"walletName\": \"cirrusdev\", \"amount\": \"0\", \"feeAmount\": \"0.001\", \"password\": \"password\", \"contractCode\": \"\", \"gasPrice\": 100, \"gasLimit\": 100000, \"sender\": \"PRm6QoGgeiRjYjqeRV762VhWVx5yuyid9J\"}"

Response: 4bee991900dfe85810e03c7bdaf941dc3cecf5dea1ca34a42651305f26a755a0


curl -X GET "http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContracts/receipt?txHash=4bee991900dfe85810e03c7bdaf941dc3cecf5dea1ca34a42651305f26a755a0" -H "accept: application/json" | jq '.' 
{
  "transactionHash": "4bee991900dfe85810e03c7bdaf941dc3cecf5dea1ca34a42651305f26a755a0",
  "blockHash": "f636ca79f4fdc3ce789e267e32c1b53d47d78409881f8fad76e1e68d9a2ce50f",
  "blockNumber": 53,
  "postState": "f997a2d863dc4fe343b0237b1fa5a803e48701543b6057d822d3a22052f7ac5d",
  "gasUsed": 12428,
  "from": "PRm6QoGgeiRjYjqeRV762VhWVx5yuyid9J",
  "to": null,
  "newContractAddress": "PXsSb2uUi1oXC37NSD26n3zhJ9utULe5Rg",
  "success": true,
  "returnValue": null,
  "bloom": "",
  "error": null,
  "logs": []
}


curl -X POST "http://localhost:38223/api/contract/PXsSb2uUi1oXC37NSD26n3zhJ9utULe5Rg/method/SayHello" -H "accept: application/json" -H "GasPrice: 100" -H "GasLimit: 100000" -H "Amount: 0" -H "FeeAmount: 0.01" -H "WalletName: cirrusdev" -H "WalletPassword: password" -H "Sender: PRm6QoGgeiRjYjqeRV762VhWVx5yuyid9J" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{}" | jq '.' 

{
  "fee": 11000000,
  "hex": "",
  "message": "Your CALL method SayHello transaction was successfully built.",
  "success": true,
  "transactionId": "39ed0de8b1e3bfbf56a6182906b153ac32140df30efca45b40712d7e630983aa"
}

curl -X GET "http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContracts/receipt?txHash=39ed0de8b1e3bfbf56a6182906b153ac32140df30efca45b40712d7e630983aa" -H "accept: application/json" | jq '.' 
{
  "transactionHash": "39ed0de8b1e3bfbf56a6182906b153ac32140df30efca45b40712d7e630983aa",
  "blockHash": "0834a7cde4cf3ce6f5bb190f4950754c131730cb45c8af6464e76d3433664bfa",
  "blockNumber": 91,
  "postState": "f997a2d863dc4fe343b0237b1fa5a803e48701543b6057d822d3a22052f7ac5d",
  "gasUsed": 10038,
  "from": "PRm6QoGgeiRjYjqeRV762VhWVx5yuyid9J",
  "to": "PXsSb2uUi1oXC37NSD26n3zhJ9utULe5Rg",
  "newContractAddress": null,

---


## List wallet
curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/list-wallets' \
  -H 'accept: */*'

{
  "walletNames": [
    "cirrusdev"
  ],
  "watchOnlyWallets": []
}

## Get wallet accounts
curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/accounts?WalletName=cirrusdev' \
  -H 'accept: */*'

[
  "account 0"
]

#Get addresses
curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/addresses?WalletName=cirrusdev&AccountName=account%200&Segwit=true' \
  -H 'accept: */*'

## Deploy smart contract: HelloWorld2
curl -X 'POST' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContractWallet/create' \
  -H 'accept: */*' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -d '{
        "walletName": "cirrusdev",
        "amount": "0",
        "feeAmount": "0.001",
        "password": "password",
        "contractCode":"",
        "gasPrice": 100,
        "gasLimit": 100000,
        "sender": "PQtqed4QTWuRSNL5VcTMciBK2hgYrd2ARf"
}'

"d66d2daf0a703509003da958eaf91986495abc188b2ef88cc7a09c0c79d4f290"


## Get receipt
curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContracts/receipt?txHash=d66d2daf0a703509003da958eaf91986495abc188b2ef88cc7a09c0c79d4f290' \
  -H 'accept: */*'


{
  "transactionHash": "d66d2daf0a703509003da958eaf91986495abc188b2ef88cc7a09c0c79d4f290",
  "blockHash": "e7954f520487c2746bfe34928e7a7a58e5b305d3ca44efc76042bb2c7048cac2",
  "blockNumber": 236,
  "postState": "40ec2e77c4c3edf7ed079c91e2f3c2d806d38ed7c5122517881191031fa58abb",
  "gasUsed": 13149,
  "from": "PQtqed4QTWuRSNL5VcTMciBK2hgYrd2ARf",
  "to": null,
  "newContractAddress": "PWdg3pXJxFvCwo6JG6fBvf8Cp6RMYPsd6a",
  "success": true,
  "returnValue": null,
  "bloom": "",
  "error": null,
  "logs": []
}

## Call smart contract method
curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:38223/api/contract/PWdg3pXJxFvCwo6JG6fBvf8Cp6RMYPsd6a/method/AddGreeting' \
--header 'GasPrice: 100' \
--header 'GasLimit: 100000' \
--header 'Amount: 0' \
--header 'FeeAmount: 0.01' \
--header 'WalletName: cirrusdev' \
--header 'WalletPassword: password' \
--header 'Sender: PQtqed4QTWuRSNL5VcTMciBK2hgYrd2ARf' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "helloMessage": "Witaj świecie!"
}'

{
    "fee": 11000000,
    "hex": "",
    "message": "Your CALL method AddGreeting transaction was successfully built.",
    "success": true,
    "transactionId": "872ac4c681274cca0a390375dc5762aadd3e6d14be26897dda46cdde3a7e0a2a"
}
